page_content:
Yulia’s Dream (continued)
supported in part by a grant from the Akamai Foundation. Yulia’s Dream is 
a free math enrichment and research program for exceptional high school students from Ukraine. During the summer, 48 Ukrainian students studied online in 16 reading groups. All these groups will complete their studies by May 2023 and make presentations at the Spring-Term PRIMES Virtual Conference.Social / Foundation / 06 Akamai Reaches Out
After the war, Ukraine needs to be rebuilt, and we want it to 
become an advanced European country. This requires a lot of young people who know math, who are good with science, especially researchers, and we want to help build that pipeline.
Professor Pavel Etingof 
Yulia’s Dream Chief Research Advisor, on WBUR
A collection of photos of Yulia Zdanovska - Provided by Yulia’s Dream
86
